meanings.definition: A flat or curved component, typically rectangular, that forms or is set into the surface of a door, wall, or ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The panel on the door was painted blue.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the panel to access the wires behind it.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the panel on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a panel of colorful buttons, each representing a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The panel of the ceiling fell off with a loud crash.

meanings.definition: A group of people gathered to discuss or make decisions on a particular topic.
meanings.sent1: The panel of experts debated the best course of action.
meanings.sent2: The panel unanimously agreed on the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The panel meeting turned into a lively debate about pizza toppings.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a panel of advisors, always ready to offer support.
meanings.sent5: The panel of judges deliberated for hours before reaching a decision.

meanings.definition: A group of musicians or other performers who perform together.
meanings.sent1: The jazz panel played a mesmerizing tune.
meanings.sent2: The panel of singers harmonized beautifully on stage.
meanings.sent3: The panel of actors rehearsed tirelessly for the upcoming play.
meanings.sent4: Their band was like a panel of superheroes, each member bringing a unique talent.
meanings.sent5: The panel of dancers moved in perfect sync, captivating the audience.
